subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: The World Golf Championships match-play event managed to keep some star power as the world No. 1 Rory McIlroy avoided elimination, but No. 2 Jordan Spieth was not so fortunate.
snippet: The World Golf Championships match-play event managed to keep some star power as the world No. 1 Rory McIlroy avoided elimination, but No. 2 Jordan Spieth was not so fortunate.
